data.trans: Thư ký (văn phòng, câu lạc bộ...)
data.trans_hint: Cô ấy làm thư ký cho chủ tịch trong một công ty.
data.en_hint: She works as a secretary for the president in a company.
data.content_game_1: She works as a secretary for the president in a company.
data.answer_en_hint: She works as a secretary for the president in a company.

data.trans_hint: Ông ấy là phó chủ tịch của một công ty đa quốc gia.
data.en_hint: He is the vice-chairman in a multinational company.
data.content_game_1: He is the vice-chairman in a multinational company.
data.answer_en_hint: He is the vice-chairman in a multinational company.

data.trans_hint: Chủ tịch của công ty trình bày báo cáo hàng năm.
data.en_hint: The chairman of the company presented the annual report.
data.content_game_1: The chairman of the company presented the annual report.
data.answer_en_hint: The chairman of the company presented the annual report.

data.trans_hint: Giám đốc đang trình bày ý tưởng mới của mình.
data.en_hint: The manager is presenting his new ideas.
data.content_game_1: The manager is presenting his new ideas.
data.answer_en_hint: The manager is presenting his new ideas.

data.trans: Trưởng phòng kinh doanh, Giám đốc kinh doanh
data.trans_hint: Ông ấy được bổ nhiệm làm trưởng phòng kinh doanh mới.
data.en_hint: He was appointed as a new sales manager.
data.content_game_1: He was appointed as a new sales manager.
data.answer_en_hint: He was appointed as a new sales manager.

data.trans_hint: Trưởng phòng kế hoạch chịu trách nhiệm lên kế hoạch cho năm mới.
data.en_hint: The planning manager takes responsibility of the plan for new year.
data.content_game_1: The planning manager takes responsibility of the plan for new year.
data.answer_en_hint: The planning manager takes responsibility of the plan for new year.

data.trans_hint: Ông ấy trở thành một trong những giám đốc điều hành quyền lực nhất thế giới.
data.en_hint: He becomes one of the most powerful Chief Executive Officers (CEOs) in the world.
data.content_game_1: He becomes one of the most powerful chief executive officers (CEOs) in the world.
data.answer_en_hint: He becomes one of the most powerful chief executive officers (CEOs) in the world.

data.trans_hint: Công ty có hơn 500 nhân viên.
data.content_game_1: The firm has over 500 employees.
data.answer_en_hint: The firm has over 500 employees.

data.trans_hint: Họ là những ông chủ rất tốt.
data.content_game_1: They're very good employers.
data.answer_en_hint: They're very good employers.

data.trans_hint: Ông ấy là giám đốc âm nhạc.
data.content_game_1: He is a musical director.
data.answer_en_hint: He is a musical director.
